nodes.text: The Subjugator was a Resurgent-class Star destroyer of the First Order Navy famous for its participation in the capture of Resistance admiral Gial Ackbar during the Cold War.

The Subjugator was 2,915.81 meters, the standard length for an Resurgent-class Star Destroyer. As such it was armed with over 1,500 turbolasers and ion cannons, Point-defense turrets, point-defense missile enmplacements and Tractor beam projectors
